text: Wa Liasta`fifi Al-Ladhina La Yajiduna Nikahaan Hatta Yughniyahumu Allahu Min Fađlihi Wa Al-Ladhina Yabtaghuna Al-Kitaba Mimma Malakat 'Aymanukum Fakatibuhum 'In `Alimtum Fihim Khayraan Wa 'Atuhum Min Mali Allahi Al-Ladhi 'Atakum Wa La Tukrihu Fatayatikum `Ala Al-Bigha'i 'In 'Aradna Tahassunaan Litabtaghu `Arađa Al-Hayaati Ad-Dunya Wa Man Yukrihhunna Fa'inna Allaha Min Ba`di 'Ikrahihinna Ghafurun Rahimun
